review:
Saving a life is a noble cause and the one who is chosen by God to save lives is always special to him as god bestow some of his powers to the chosen one, this is what a Doctor is, the chosen one to save life of the suffering ones and that is what I found after meeting Dr. Lata Bhat. 
*** **** ** ****** ************ ******** ** *** ***** ** ************ She has been incredible is dealing with our New borns. One thing I like most about her is that she is a very understanding, supportive and a down to earth human being canâ€™t find easily in today world. She is an Idol doctor who takes full responsibility and know her duties very well. 
I wish her Good Luck and may god help her with his utmost powers in saving the little one. I recommend her for New born all time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: its matter of last month my daughter was ill n suddenly she started to vomit repeatedly i got so worried and made a call to  doctor lata bhat so thankfull to her she answered my call at 12 am and gave me prescription . i am very much satisfied and happy to have a doctor like lata bhat for my baby. Thanks mam .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Lata Bhat is a very good doctor, she is helpful by nature & good human being.I felt when talk with mam, it is rare to find this type doctor in today's world. Her treatment technique is so good and help child to develop up to maximum level. She always focus on that type of treatment which make child independent and will not need any type of support in future.She tell very clearly and never hide any serious problem, it makes different from other doctor. All doctor and employee is also very good at her centre. She also support poor child financially.
At last..She is the symbol of humanity.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is soft spoken. Treats with minimal medicine needed. I would definitely refer people to visit her.
I had to wait for more than 50 min to get connected but doctor was excellent.I am very much satisfied..
I know Dr Lata Bhat from past 5 years...since my kids were born, as they were preterm and under supervision of Dr Lata Bhat..and she really work hard towards each kid
Very good. She treates kid in her own way and my kid enjoys her presence. She treates her so well. Good way in explaining things to parents too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She took every details regarding my child. Listened to my concerns patiently. Prognosis & diagnosis on point.
I had to wait for more than 45mins to get connected but it was worth..The doctor was excellent..Thanks for all the help
